[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/misc/wallpaper_glue.c

* Wallpaper glue. Used in conjunction with /obj/misc/wallpaper and a paint * brush to decorate the walls of playerhouses. * * One pot used per wall. * * When adding this object to shops, please call add_glue() on the pot. * This will give it one application's worth of glue. * * @author Una * @date August 27th, 2002 * *

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /obj/vessel.c

Method index

add_glue()

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
add_glue
object add_glue()
